mute_explanation_modal.body_html:
Muting means you won't be notified about proposals, or any other activity in this thread, unless someone @mentions you.

Muted threads are hidden from Recent and Unread pages too. To find your Muted threads, select the Muted option in the sidebar:

dismiss_explanation_modal.body_html: Dismissing a thread removes it from your unread items. If any new activity occurs in the thread, it will show as unread again.

contact_message_form.new_contact_message: Thanks for getting in touch; we''ll get back to you soon!

help_page.coordinating_details: Ako koordinátor ste zodpovedný/á za konfiguráciu nastavení pre vašu Loomio skupinu a rozoslanie pozvánok do nej. Budete sa musieť aj naučiť používať túto aplikáciu a túto znalosť šíriť medzi členmi skupiny, aby boli funkcie ktoré aplikácia ponúka využívané efektívne. Tu je niekoľko tipov ktoré vám pomôžu v tejto úlohe:
help_page.engaging_html:
Tips for engaging your group

People will be excited to jump in and start participating when there’s an engaging proposal on the table. A good proposal contains a plan of action for the group, so that it’s immediately obvious what it means to agree or disagree. Think about how you can identify discussions/decisions the group is currently undertaking in person or by email that would be easier if they were on Loomio.

If your group is just starting out, you could start a lighthearted decision, to give everyone a chance to play with the tool and see the decisionmaking process in action.

Another simple way to encourage people to engage in a discussion is to use the @mention feature to prompt specific people; this will send them an email to tell them they’ve been mentioned in a comment.
help_page.example1_html:
Vaša skupina potrebuje dosiahnuť riešenie komplexného problému

Stratégia: Predtým než sformulujete návrh, diskutujte o probléme istý čas.

Diskusie často vedú k jednotnému pohľadu na problém a ten zvyšuje pravdepodobnosť, že bude sformulovaný kvalitný návrh. Ak sú ľudia od počiatku zaangažovaní v diskusii o probléme, zvyšuje sa pravdepodobnosť že aj prijmú konečné rozhodnutie.
help_page.example2_html:
You already have a proposal in mind, and you want to get signoff from the group to move forward.

Strategy: Start a discussion about a specific decision and make a proposal immediately.

If you’ve got a clear outcome in mind but you want to make sure there aren’t any critical concerns, you can use the proposal to get quick input into a decision.

You can do things like finalise a document, approve an application, or signoff on a piece of work.
help_page.get_in_touch_description_html: Pokiaľ máte akékoľvek otázky alebo pripomienky, napíšte nám.
help_page.getting_started_description: Naľavo skupina prediskutuje tému, vymení si názory a informácie. Keď nastane čas na rozhodnutie, toto sa objaví napravo.
help_page.have_your_say_details_html:
Ak ste pripravený/á hlasovať, voľte kliknutím na jedno z hlasovacích tlačidiel.

Môžte prípadne aj poskytnúť stručné zdôvodnenie vašej voľby. Pod grafom je vidieť poznámky uvedené inými hlasujúcimi. Počas hlasovanie môžte meniť svoj postoj, ak sa tento mení pod vplyvom názorov iných hlasujúcich.
help_page.have_a_discussion_description: Téma a akékoľvek relevantné súvisiace informácie sa nachádzajú v hornej časti stránky. Pomocou poľa pre komentár vneste svoj názor do diskusie.
help_page.invitation_html:
Ako napísať efektívnu pozvánku

Prvá otázka ktorá bude zaujímať väčšinu nových členov je, 'načo je táto skupina?'

Porozmýšľajte nad najjednoduchším opisom poslania skupiny: Čo chcete aby jej členovia spolu dosiahli? Aký typ rozhodnutí sa v nej bude prijímať? Kto sú typickí členovia skupiny?

Pred samotným pozvaním nových členov je dobré sa s nimi najprv porozprávať a objasniť im dôvody, pre ktoré by mali s členstvom v skupine súhlasiť.
help_page.join_the_community_description_html:
Everyone is welcome to join the Loomio Community, where we talk about how to make the most of the tool, and how it can be improved.

Click here to go the Loomio Community group.
help_page.images_and_text_formatting_html:
Loomio používa ‘Markdown’ formát na vkladanie obrázkov a formátovanie štýlu textu. Do Markdown módu môžte prepnúť kliknutím na šedú ikonku pod poľom na vkladanie komentára.

Kliknite sem ak sa chcete dozvedieť ako používať Markdown.
help_page.keep_up_to_date_html:
Kliknutím na názov vašej skupiny na vrchu stránky sa zobrazí stránka skupiny, kde môžte vidieť zoznam všetkých diskusií a rozhodnutí prijatých v tej skupine. Ak ste členom/kou viacerých skupín, možte vidieť všetky informácie zo všetkých skupín na domovskej stránke.

O dôležitých udalostiach vo vašej skupine budete informovaný/á pomocou emailu. Nastavenia zasielania emailových správ môžte zmeniť tu.
help_page.make_a_decision_description: Keď je skupina pripravená urobiť rozhodnutie, každý môže vytvoriť návrh. Krátko popíšte jasný návrh postupu a poskytnite určitý základ, aby každý vedel, čo presne znamená súhlasiť, alebo nesúhlasiť.
help_page.prompt_people_details: Pokiaľ chcete získať pozornosť konkrétnej osoby vo vašej skupine, napíšte ‚@‘ nasledované ich menom. Oslovaný(á) dostane email, který ich upozorní, že ste ho(ju) spomenul(a).
help_page.positions_agree_description: Súhlasím znamená, že ste s návrhom spokojný(á).
help_page.positions_abstain_description: Zdržujem sa znamená, že si nie ste istý(á), alebo že budete rád(a), ak sa skupina rozhodne bez vás.
help_page.positions_disagree_description: Nesúhlasím znamená, že myslíte, že by mohla existovať lepšia možnosť, ale ste ochotný(á) prijať rozhodnutie skupiny.
help_page.positions_block_description: Zamietam znamená, že máte vážne námietky a budete veľmi nešťastná/ý, pokiaľ sa bude podľa návrhu postupovať.
help_page.start_discussion_html:
When you start a discussion, make sure the title conveys the topic succinctly. Use the Context Panel to give all the background information necessary for the group to have a productive and informed discussion.

During the discussion, the Context Panel can be updated as new information comes to light. As well as clarifying the topic, you can use this space for sharing resources, summarising the discussion as it progresses, or outlining the decisionmaking protocols your group is using.
help_page.start_proposal_html:
Ak zvolíte výstižný názov, ľudia budú hneď vedieť čo v nej znamená súhlasiť alebo nesúhlasiť.

Nebude tragédiou ak návrh hneď nedosiahne jasný súhlas. Ak väčšina považuje prvý návrh za nezaujímavý, ktokoľvek môže začať nový.

Týmto dynamickým procesom sa môže skupina kolektívne dopracovať k lepším formuláciam problému ako by to dokázal jednotlivec.

Konečný termín na uzatvorenie diskusie sa dá kedykoľvek posunúť, ak to vyzerá tak, že diskusia potrebuje viac času. Každý dostane email 24 hodín pred jej uzatvorením.
help_page.video_tutorial_description: Pozrite si rýchlu ukážku toho, ako sa Loomio používa.

explore_page.no_results_found: Can't find the group you're looking for? If a group's privacy is set to 'secret', it won't appear here. If you know who coordinates the group, you could ask them for an invite.

enable.title: Try the new Loomio
enable.intro: We've rebuilt Loomio and we need your help to make sure it is awesome!
enable.body_html:
What's the difference anyway?

The new interface is like the old interface but newer:

  • Everything updates live on the page as it happens
  • It’s designed for all your devices, from smartphone to desktop
  • It’s accessible to people who are blind, and translated into heaps of languages

It uses the same database as the old interface, meaning it will have all your existing groups and discussions.

There is a link to "Give feedback" in the bottom left corner. You'll also see a link there to "Switch back to old Loomio", which will remain available for the next little while.

We really look forward to hearing your feedback, thanks for your time and support.

disable.title: Thanks for trying the new Loomio
disable.body_html: Yikes, did we do something wrong? We're sorry if you had a bad time in the new Loomio.

poll_common_unsubscribe_form.label: Receive email updates about this decision
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.tooltip: Loomio can send email updates to keep you informed about this decision, such as when it is edited, when it expires, or when an outcome has been set. Unchecking this box ensures that you won't receive further email notifications for decision.
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.helptext_on: You will receive emails about activity in this decision
poll_common_unsubscribe_form.helptext_off: You will not receive any emails about this decision

poll_common_form.title: Title
poll_common_form.no_options: You haven't added any options yet.

poll_proposal_form.tool_tip_expanded:
A proposal is a tool for seeking collective agreement about a statement or course of action.

Participants can agree, abstain, disagree or block - and give a statement to explain their position.

A pie chart gives an overview of the positions in the group, while the statements allow individual voices to be heard.

Don't be discouraged if you don't see agreement at first, proposals are designed to surface issues that need resolving.

With good participation a proposal is a powerful mandate to take action.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_proposal_form.tip: Seek collective agreement through a process which allows all voices to be heard. Learn more
poll_proposal_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Let's go to the moon!
poll_proposal_form.details_placeholder: Give enough information so everyone knows what it means to agree or disagree

poll_poll_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Use a poll to measure popularity or offer a choice.

Provide some options to choose from. Decide if participants choose single or multiple options as their response.

Everyone votes, and can enter a statement too if they like. Results are represented in a bar graph.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_poll_form.tool_tip_collapsed: Measure popularity or offer a choice
poll_poll_form.tip: Measure the popularity of different options
poll_poll_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Where do you want to go on holiday?
poll_poll_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to answer the question.
poll_poll_form.multiple_choice_explained: Allow voters to select as many options as they like.

poll_count_form.tool_tip_expanded:
A check is a tool with many possible uses but only 2 responses: Tick or Dash.

Use it to engage people with an offer, like an RSVP: "I'm coming to the event" or "I'll join the working group".

Or use it to track completion of a task: "I've checked my contact details are correct", or "I've read the document and left my feedback".

A check has a goal, which is the number of participants you'd like. The goal indicates to the group if something needs more attention or is well subscribed.

A day before the check closes, it will remind those who have not participated to do so - like a digital cat herder.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_count_form.tip: Engage people with an offer or request
poll_count_form.title_placeholder: E.g. Who wants to join the working group?
poll_count_form.details_placeholder: Explain what commitment is involved, or give details about how to participate.

poll_dot_vote_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Dot voting is a way to prioritise a list of options.

Participants are given a limited number of ‘dots’ which they can allocate however they like among the options provided to represent their own preferences.

The totals of the results are shown, as well as and the individual votes, so you can consider various points of view.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_dot_vote_form.title_placeholder: E.g. How should we allocate our budget?
poll_dot_vote_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate

poll_meeting_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Use a time poll to find when people are available to meet.

Enter a list of dates or times when you could have your meeting.

Participants tick those which they’re able to attend, or they can use the statement field to explain their circumstances, so you can update the options if necessary.

If you add new times during a time poll, people who have already voted are prompted to update their response.

You can then see who’s available when, and decide when to meet.

Times are automatically converted to the participant's local time zone.

Learn more on Loomio School.
poll_meeting_form.tip: Find out when people are available to meet
poll_meeting_form.title_placeholder: E.g. When should we have our next meetup?
poll_meeting_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate
poll_meeting_form.no_options: You haven't added any time slots yet.

poll_ranked_choice_form.tool_tip_expanded:
Ranked choice is a voting method which allows each voter to respond with their preferences in order.

It's preferable when 'vote stealing' is a concern (ie, two somewhat popular options are similar enough that they end up sharing votes between them), and can be used to implement a Condorcet, or Instant Runoff style election.
poll_ranked_choice_form.tip: Find out when people are available to meet
poll_ranked_choice_form.title_placeholder: E.g. who should take over as chairman of the board?
poll_ranked_choice_form.details_placeholder: Provide any clarifying details people might need to participate
poll_ranked_choice_form.no_options: You haven't added any options yet.
poll_ranked_choice_form.minimum_stance_choices_helptext: Number of options each voter may rank

poll_proposal_vote_form.abstain_reason_placeholder: Let people know why you’re opting out of this decision
poll_proposal_vote_form.agree_reason_placeholder: What do you like about the proposal and how will it benefit the group?
poll_proposal_vote_form.disagree_reason_placeholder: How could this proposal be improved so that you can support it?
poll_proposal_vote_form.block_reason_placeholder: Explain your objection to this proposal and why it should not go ahead

poll_proposal_options.agree_meaning: This proposal is good enough to be adopted by the group
poll_proposal_options.abstain_meaning: Not sure, don’t know or don’t mind. Will support the outcome either way
poll_proposal_options.disagree_meaning: I don’t support the proposal. It should not go ahead.
poll_proposal_options.block_meaning: The urgent attention of the group is required to address a deep concern

poll_count_options.yes_meaning: I volunteer, give my consent, or have completed the given task
poll_count_options.no_meaning: I am unable to contribute or to participate in this decision

poll_count_vote_form.reason_placeholder: Leave a message if you like

poll_ranked_choice_vote_form.helptext: Drag and drop options in order of preference (1 being your most preferred option). Your top {{count}} choices will be recorded.

slack_page.header: Loomio and Slack work great together!
slack_page.intro: We're proud to introduce LoomioBot, a friendly helper for use with Slack.
slack_page.description: LoomioBot can help you supercharge your team's decisionmaking by combining Slack’s lightning-fast realtime communication, with the robust, simple tools in Loomio.
slack_page.from_chat_to_discussion:
Slack's realtime chat is great for keeping in touch and getting quick responses.
Loomio's threads are the online equivilent of a meeting.
Keep everything about a topic in one place,
let people participate in their own time,
and get clear outcomes with Loomio's decision making tools.
slack_page.grant_access_subtext: No need to sync contact lists, or invite people to tools they're not familiar with. LoomioBot seamlessly authenticates anyone in your slack channel to your Loomio group.
slack_page.start_poll_subtext: Want to get a quick temperature check of the people in the room? Type a simple command and we'll prepare a decision to share with your team instantly
slack_page.receive_updates: Receive updates about decisions in real time
slack_page.receive_updates_subtext: Reach people where they are. Everyone on slack will receive updates about important events as they happen.
slack_page.vote_instantly_subtext: No need to leave your chat window to make your voice heard; simply click a button and you're done!
slack_page.on_paid_plan: The LoomioBot integration is available for groups on a Gold plan or higher

pricing_page.free_is_for_community_and_evaluation_htm:
Our free plan is for casual and community groups or evaluation purposes.
Want the Gold plan for your community or non-profit group? Use coupon code NFP5USD for $5/month price.
pricing_page.privacy_respected: We respect your privacy and will never sell your data to third parties, nor put advertising into Loomio.
pricing_page.prices_in_us_dollars: Prices are per group, in US dollars, plus sales tax where applicable.
pricing_page.need_something_else_html: Need managed private hosting, consultation & training, custom branding, or something else?

marketing.too_many_emails_and_meetings: Too many emails and tedious meetings?
marketing.inclusive_clear_and_effecient_tools: Thoughfully designed to be inclusive, clear, and efficient
marketing.loomio_is_the_answer: Loomio saves time, gives clear outcomes, and keeps everything in one place.

marketing.choose_the_tool: Choose the tool that suits your situation.
marketing.proposals_bring_conclusion_html: Proposals are an effective way to bring a discussion to conclusion.

marketing.proposals_highlight_agreement: Proposals highlight agreement, and can surface misunderstandings or issues that need to be resolved.

marketing.when_there_are_tasks_to_be_done_html: When there are tasks to be done, or you just want to get an 'ok' from people, Check makes participation clear and saves you chasing people up.
marketing.a_place_for_your: A place for your discussions & decisions
marketing.a_loomio_group_is_a_safe_place_html: A Loomio group is a safe place to have considered discussions and make decisions away from social media.
marketing.its_secure_and_searchable: It's a secure and searchable archive of your discussions, decisions, and files.
marketing.make_a_decision_in_email: Make a decision in email, with anyone.

marketing.loomio_is_a_web_app: Loomio is a web app with great desktop and mobile support.

marketing.we_know_it_can_be_hard: We know it can be hard to start using a new tool. With Loomio you can participate and stay updated by email.

press.fast_company: The beauty of Loomio is in it's simplicity. It does exactly what it needs to do and no more.
press.boingboing: Loomio seems to have a good mix of political savvy, technical knowhow, and design sense.
press.bbc: Loomio is set to be the Facebook of the citizen web.

marketing.loomio_is_a_social_enterprise: Loomio is a social enterprise collectively owned by the people building it.
marketing.loomio_exists_to: Loomio exists to make it easy for anyone, anywhere, to participate in decisions that affect their lives.

introduction.first_paragraph: Loomio is open source software, built by a worker-owned cooperative social enterprise. We are based in Aotearoa New Zealand, and are part of the
introduction.second_paragraph: We believe that more groups practicing effective, inclusive decision-making can change organisational dynamics at a global scale. Loomio exists to make it easy for anyone, anywhere, to participate in decisions that affect their lives.

story.heading: Story
story.first_paragraph:
Loomio began in 2011, when activists from Occupy Wall Street and social entrepreneurs from the Enspiral Network realised they needed to solve the same problem: fast, inclusive, effective decision-making without meetings.
In 2012, we formed our cooperative and released a prototype (Loomio Beta). We found that many others around the world needed the same solution.
story.second_paragraph:
In 2013, we ran a successful international crowdfunding campaign, enabling us to work on a new version of the software, Loomio 1.0, which was released the following year.
In 2015, we raised a round of ethical capital, and are working to bring collaborative decision-making to millions more people around the world.

people.heading: People
people.introduction: We’re a passionate team with deep expertise in group process facilitation, social change, business entrepreneurship, and open technology development.
people.alanna: Co-founder, facilitator, bossless leadership geek, Enspiral Foundation director, cat lover
people.babs: Company Secretary, operations, activist, nature lover
people.ben: Co-founder and director, community organizer, collective intelligence researcher
people.hannah: Software developer, user support, illustrator and DIY publisher, creative activist
people.james: Senior software developer, open source community coordinator, daring swashbuckler
people.mary: Organisational wrangler, collaborator, team coach, pot luck hoster, star gazer
people.matthew: Looking after customers, numbers, and design
people.michael: Director, business and customer development, coordinator, startup coach, motorcyclist
people.mj: Director, US based strategist, dot connector, coach, proud mama
people.richard: Co-founder and software developer, activist, open source hardware hacker
people.robert: Senior developer, DevOps, architecture. Thinks up ideas and writes them into software
people.vivien: Co-founder, Chair of Loomio Board, Executive Director of UNICEF New Zealand

advisors.heading: Advisors
advisors.introduction: We’re backed by an Advisory Council with some of the brightest minds in democracy and tech internationally.
advisors.sascha: Founder of X-Lab & Open Technology Institute
advisors.katherine: Former Senior Vice President, AOL, Vice Chair of Root Capital
advisors.joi: Director of MIT Media Lab, Co-founder Creative Commons, Board of Mozilla Foundation
advisors.douglas: Bestselling author, CNN commentator, media theorist

purpose_and_values.heading: Purpose & Values
purpose_and_values.mission_statement: The Loomio Co-operative exists to create a world where it’s easy for anyone to participate in decisions that affect them.
purpose_and_values.introduction:
With the right collaborative process, groups generate better ideas, decisions and actions than any individual would by themselves.
The Loomio Co-operative aims to break down the barriers to participation in decision-making at every level: in neighbourhoods, community organisations, businesses, social movements, and local and national governance.
purpose_and_values.coop_body:
Loomio is a social enterprise collectively owned by the people building it. Unlike a traditional profit­ maximising company, revenue is not an end in itself, but a means towards achieving a core social purpose.
A worker-owned cooperative structure is a powerful way to live our values of collaboration and collective ownership.
purpose_and_values.independent_body: Loomio is committed to remaining independent so it can provide a neutral place for any group to come together.
purpose_and_values.open_source_body: Loomio aims to develop open-source tools that make collaboration accessible to everyone.
purpose_and_values.adaptive_body: Loomio aims to develop tools which are iterative, self-reflexive and adaptive, driven by the collective wisdom of the user community.
purpose_and_values.transparent_body:
The Loomio Co-operative will be surrounded by a valued community of users and contributors. This community must be confident that the Loomio Co-operative is doing what it says it is.
We are committed to high standards for sharing information.

loomio_tags.destroy_helptext: This will destroy this tag and remove it from all threads in the group. Are you sure?
loomio_tags.helptext: Tags allow you to categorize conversations and easily find them later
loomio_tags.no_tags_present: No threads were found with that tag! Try selecting another one.
